plugins.name: GeneXus Prototyper
plugins.description:
The GeneXus Prototyper plugin creates a fully functional application prototype based on your Figma design without relying on programmers to import it. You can experience and test the behavior of your design in a real app before sending it to the development team to continue the implementation of the business logic.


🚀 Effortless Prototyping

Generate a fully functional application prototype leveraging GeneXus technology and the Design Import tool.


✨ Designer Empowerment

Craft your design file without the need for programmers in the initial stages of the development cycle.


🛠️ Streamlined Workflow

Speed up the adjustment phase and prototype creation, making the development process efficient and frictionless.


☁️ Cloud Deployment

Get a sharable link to your prototype, ensuring accessibility from anywhere, anytime.


📱 Real App Evaluation

Test the behavior of your design in a real app using just your browser for Web and Angular generators or download the GeneXus Project Navigator for Android and Apple generators.


USAGE

Please refer to GeneXus Prototyper for Figma.


FAQ


Q: What is GeneXus?

A: GeneXus is a Low-Code Platform that automates the software development process, allowing developers to create applications for multiple platforms with reduced effort and time. Know more about us at GeneXus Website.


Q: Who is this plugin for?

A: For designers who have to adjust a design to be imported into the GeneXus platform.


Q: Is it free to use?

A: Yes. There are no in-app purchases when installing the plugin. You just have to create a GeneXus account to start using this powerful tool.


Q: Is the prototype result pixel-perfect?

A: The precision of the prototype depends on how organized, tidy, and clear your design is and how well you've applied the design guidelines, conventions and best practices we recommend while designing your application. Keep in mind that every design decision will impact the runtime result.


Q: Why I'm getting an error saying "Could not connect to the server at this moment" when trying to get logged in?

A: There might be temporary downtimes in our server for maintenance. Please be patient and retry using this plugin later.


SUPPORT


Your thoughts, ideas, and suggestions for improvement are welcome and highly valued. Connect with us at GeneXus Support.

plugins.name: Icon Component Validator
plugins.description:
As recommended by Font Awesome, Figma’s Boolean Groups offer icon designers non-destructive and flexible editing capabilities, streamlining workflows and enabling efficient management of large icon systems.


By leveraging Boolean Groups, this plugin further enhances efficiency and consistency in your icon library by automating structural integrity checks and enabling color inheritance.


Key Features:

  1. Quick and smart validation
  2. Locate problematic component
  3. One-click fix
  4. Customizable


How to Use

  1. (Optional) Adjust settings to match your validation criteria
  2. Make a selection that contains components to check
  3. Click the "Validate Selection" button
  4. Review results and use "Locate" and "Fix" functions as needed


To try this plugin, you can duplicate the Charcoal Icons file, make any changes to the icons, and then run the plugin.

===


Font Awesome が推奨したように、Figmaのブーリアングループ（Boolean Groups）は、アイコンデザイナーに対して非破壊的かつ柔軟な編集機能を提供し、ワークフローを合理化し、大規模なアイコンシステムの効率的な管理を可能にします。


このプラグインは、ブーリアングループの活用によって、アイコンライブラリの効率性と一貫性をさらに向上させます。構造的な整合性の自動チェックや、色の継承を可能を担保します。


主な機能:

  1. 高速かつスマートなバリデーション
  2. 問題のあるコンポーネントの特定
  3. ワンクリック修正
  4. カスタマイズ可能

使用方法：

  1. （任意）バリデーション基準に合わせて設定を調整
  2. 検証したいコンポーネントか範囲を選択
  3. 「Validate Selection」（選択範囲を検証）ボタンをクリック
  4. 結果を確認し、必要に応じて「Locate」（特定）や「Fix」（修正）機能を使用


このプラグインを試すには、Charcoal Iconsを複製し、アイコンに変更を加えた後、プラグインを実行してください。

plugins.name: Export Svg React Icons
plugins.description:
Export Figma icons to React ready svg code.

Select any vector icon designed in Figma while the plugin is open.

The svg code for the icon will show with a copy button.


The following transformation happend to the svg code initially proposed by Figma:

  • Transform stroke-linecap to strokeLinecap
  • Transform stroke-linejoin to strokeLinejoin
  • Transform stroke-width to strokeWidth
  • Transform fill-rule to fillRule
  • Transform clip-rule to clipRule
  • Remove width, height, stroke and fill attributes
  • Adds class "outlined"
plugins.tagline: Export Figma icons to React ready svg code

plugins.name: Export Variables to Power Apps
plugins.description:
Export Variables to Power Apps


"Export Variables to Power Apps" is a plugin designed for Power Apps developers, simplifying the conversion of Figma variables into Power Apps variables.


Features:


Transform your Figma variables into Power Apps collections according to your needs, effectively handling variable modes.


Configuration Options: Customize your export settings to meet project requirements.

  1. Structuring Options: Choose between structuring by Figma collections or by variable type.
  2. Power FX Syntax: Supports both English and French.
  3. Color Conversion: Convert colors into RGBA() or hexadecimal formats.
  4. Variable Flattening: Option to simplify the structure of variables.


How to Use:


  1. Open the "Export Variables to Power Apps" plugin.
  2. Configure your export preferences.
  3. Generate and copy your variables.
  4. Paste them into your Power Apps application.


Optimize your workflow from design to development with "Export Variables to Power Apps"!
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma variables to Power Apps variables.

plugins.name: Properties Shortcuts
plugins.description:
This plugin has 2 uses:

  1. Increment Property To step through a specific instance’s property, only allowing valid combinations.
  2. Next/Previous Variation Stepping forward and backwards through all possible variant combinations

Combined with shortcut keys these are effective ways to view properties


How to use Increment Property

  1. ⌘ + / to access the quick actions menu
  2. Navigate to Increment Property
  3. Tab → to access to properties list
  4. Select the property you want to iterate and press return ⏎
  5. Use the Run last plugin menu command to step again (this can be accessed quickly through the quick actions panel or by setting up a shortcut key)


How to use Next/Previous Variation

  1. ⌘ + / to access the quick actions menu
  2. Navigate to Next/Prev Variation
  3. Use the Run last plugin menu command to step again (this can be accessed quickly through the quick actions panel or by setting up a shortcut key)


How to use quick actions on Figma

How to set up keyboard shortcuts on macOS



If you find this plugin useful feel free to buy me a slice of pizza
plugins.tagline: Quickly step through instance properties to find the right possible combination

plugins.name: 批量填充文本 Text Fill
plugins.description:
🤞在做表单设计的时候，大量文本修改非常繁琐，运用此插件可以一键替换所有文本

🎈使用说明

填充文本：选中要替换文案的文本，在输入框里面输入内容，一行对应一个，点击“填充文本”就可以了

选择文本：如果同时选中了很多类型的元素，选择文本可以只选中文本，取消选中其他类型的元素。如果选中一个画板，点击“选择文本”就可以快速选中画板中所有的文本

复制文本：把选中的文本复制到插件的输入框中

🍖附加功能

给文本添加前缀或后缀

给文本添加前编号或后编号，编号是输入起始值。比如输入1，就从1开始计数，输入10，就从10开始计数。也可以输入大小写字母，除了数字和字母，其他类型的字符将不生效。

倒序填充是输入框中的内容从尾到头填充
plugins.tagline: 批量修改文本，快速选择文本，复制文本内容

plugins.name: WriteAI
plugins.description:
Introducing WriteAI Plugin for Figma! This powerful plugin allows you to generate tailor-made copy for your designs directly within Figma. Customize your copy based on mood, role, audience, content type, and description to create the perfect text for your projects.


To start using WriteAI Plugin:

  1. Install the plugin and open it within Figma.
  2. Enter your API key in the input field. If you don't have one yet, you can acquire it from the OpenAI platform.
  3. Select a text node in your Figma design or create a new one.
  4. Input your desired criteria, such as mood, role, audience, and content type, as well as a brief description of the copy you want to generate.
  5. Click the "Generate Copy" button and watch the magic happen.


The plugin will call the OpenAI API to generate a fitting copy based on your input. The generated text will replace the selected text node or create a new one if none is selected. Your API key will be securely stored in Figma's client storage for future use. To update or remove the API key, simply input a new one or delete the existing one in the input field.


If you have any suggestions for enhancements, encounter any bugs, or would like to share your thoughts on improving the plugin, please don't hesitate to leave a comment.
plugins.tagline: AI-Powered copy fine-tuning tool

plugins.name: Inspector
plugins.description:
Introducing Inspector - the ultimate Figma plugin for inspecting and improving your developer workflow. With Inspector, you can effortlessly inspect your Figma layers, search Figma by layer name, text layer value, or by Figma node id to streamline your development process. Say goodbye to the hassle of manually searching for your Figma layers and their properties. Inspector does the heavy lifting for you, so you can focus on what really matters - creating amazing plugins.


How to Use?


  • On the 'Select' page, select any Figma layer to get it's details
  • Click on your results, to view their basic info, or click on the 'JSON' tab to inspect the layer details
  • On the 'Search' page, you can search by layer name, or text layer value. Filter by page, and layer type to drill down your query even further

  • Search by Figma node id, by entering 'id=' before the desired id


Contact:

https://docs.google.com/forms/d/e/1FAIpQLSc1r2qBhXE5s3MpBnbUiseAA_QeKDAZoc8ZQct3H9Ca43N1vQ/viewform?usp=sf_link
plugins.tagline: Effortlessly search, select, and filter your Figma layers with ease - streamline your workflow

plugins.name: Layer Auditor
plugins.description:
Scan and audit layers for missing styles and variables.


Layer Auditor helps you audit your designs to ensure all layer properties are linked to appropriate styles or variables. This streamlines hand-offs by eliminating guesswork about styles and variables in the design library for developers. The plugin updates in real-time as you fix the missing styles or variables. If you add or remove layers, simply re-audit the page for the latest results.


Note: It ignores basic shapes, images, and illustrations, as these elements typically don't use styles or variables. If such elements are flagged, you can hover over them to dimiss them from the list.


I'm actively working on more enhancements and I welcome your suggestions. Please DM me on Twitter for any questions or feedback.
plugins.tagline: Scan and audit layers for missing styles and variables.

plugins.name: Multi-Page Background Color
plugins.description:
Multi-Page Background Color 🎨

Tired of changing background colors one page at a time?


With this plugin apply page background to every page with ease.

Save time ⏳ and focus on what matters—designing! Perfect for a smoother, faster workflow.


How to Use:

  1. Open the Plugin: Run the Page Background Manager from the plugins menu.
  2. Set as Current Page Background: Instantly apply the current page's background color to all other pages.
  3. Set Custom Color: Select a new color using the color picker and apply it across all pages.


Done: Your background colors are updated in just a few clicks! 🌟
plugins.tagline: Set consistent backgrounds color for ALL your Figma pages. No need to change color for each page.

plugins.name: Ebook Frame Creator
plugins.description:
------------------------

it's really just getting startedᅳthink of it as version 0.1.6, but more like a newborn baby I'm nurturing day by day. there is a story behind it. found myself working alongside a team that had this huge task ahead of themᅳcreating 100 ebooks using ChatGPT, no less i thought to myself, there's got to be a way to make this easier.


lightbulb went off, i started piecing together the EbookFrameCreator plugin. It's designed to snugly fit into Figma because, let's face it, we all love how easy Figma makes design work, right? But this plugin? It's a game-changer. It turns what used to be a daunting task into something you can breeze through, boosting productivity like nobody's business by smoothing out and speeding up the whole ebook creation flow.


i didn't just make it for a single team. i'm seeing how much it helped them, it just felt right to share it with everyone. It's kind of my way of throwing a little bit of help out into the world for anyone who's ever found themselves bogged down with design work. I'm all about sharing the love, making sure that creative folks have what they need to make their projects a little less stressful and a lot more fun. yeah, that's the scoop on my little project. Can't wait to see how it grows and helps even more people down the line!
plugins.tagline: Create Ebooks Faster

plugins.name: PackCanvas
plugins.description:
插件主要致力于解决项目的切图交付问题，目前支持功能：


  1. 可自定义导出，支持只导出或导出并压缩两种模式，导出的范围为选中的【图层 / 画板 / 页面】中的所有切图，完成后自动打包成 zip 格式，可一键下载切图压缩包


  1. 可自定义压缩次数，在保证质量的前提下最大程度减小切图大小


  1. 可自动添加 Export 属性，无需手动对图层逐个设置 Export 属性


  1. 可预览压缩效果，支持本地和在线两种预览方式，方便二次确认切图数量、尺寸和质量等属性是否符合预期


  1. 可自定义下载， 在线预览时，支持自定义选择所需切图进行打包下载


  1. 可查看失败详细信息，预览页提供压缩失败图层详细信息，支持一键定位到失败图层位置，方便快速查找


  1. 可下载压缩失败图层，压缩失败图层在下载时，会下载默认导出图层（非压缩过），并单独存放在一个文件夹中


  1. ...


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


大家在使用过程中遇到任何问题，欢迎大家直接在下方评论提出，也可通过邮箱发送相关问题，博主将在收到问题的第一时间解决。


大家对后续的想要支持的功能也可以直接在下方评论或邮箱戳我，在评估后会进行回复排期支持～


感谢大家的支持，如果觉得插件对你有帮助，不妨帮博主把右上角的爱心点亮呀～👻🥰🙏

联系我


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


The plug-in is mainly dedicated to solving the problem of project slices and delivery, and currently supports functions:


  1. The export can be customized, and it supports two modes of export only or export and compression. The range of export can be the slices image in the selected layer/artboard(s)/page. After completion, it will be automatically packaged into zip format, and the slices image can be downloaded with one click Archive.


  1. The number of compressions can be customized to minimize the size of the slices image while ensuring the quality.


  1. The Export property can be added automatically, no need to manually set the Export property for each layer.


  1. The compression effect can be previewed, and both local and online preview methods are supported, which is convenient for secondary confirmation of whether attributes such as the number, size, and quality of slices images meet expectations.


  1. The download can be customized. When previewing online, it supports custom selection of the desired slices images for package download.


  1. Detailed information of the failure can be viewed. The preview page provides detailed information of the failed compression layer. It supports locating the location of the failed layer with one click to facilitate quick search.


  1. You can download the layer that failed to compress. When downloading the layer that failed to compress, the default export layer (non-compressed) will be downloaded and stored in a separate folder.


  1. ...


---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------


If you encounter any problems during use, you are welcome to comment directly below, or you can send related questions through the email, and the blogger will solve the problem as soon as it receives it.


If you want to support the follow-up functions, you can also directly comment below or poke me in the email address. After the evaluation, we will reply and schedule support.


Thank you for your support. If you think the plug-in is helpful to you, you might as well help the blogger to light up the heart in the upper right corner.👻🥰🙏

Contact
plugins.tagline: Auto generate compress export images as same download.

plugins.name: Pixel Art Studio
plugins.description:
Simple pixel canvas with export in Figma.

Plugin is in early stage of development, any feedback is appreciated.


Features:


Drawing canvas

  1. Left click to draw, right click to erase
  2. Resizing canvas will auto change proportions of pixels inside
  3. Plugin remembers up to 8 last colors
  4. Clear canvas to remove start from scratch


Export

  1. Export drawing from canvas, convert it to 1x1 px squares and group them
  2. Works best when Figma frame is selected


Import

  1. Import every 1x1 px square from selection to canvas
  2. Auto resizes canvas to selected frame size
  3. If Squares is checked will also convert every rectangle to the set of 1x1 px squares
  4. Import will ignore any component or component instance


Convert to squares

  1. Convert every rectangle to the set of 1x1 px squares and group them
  2. Working both with selection and frames
  3. Convert to squares will ignore any component or component instance


Remove overlap

  1. Take every 1x1 px squares with the same coordinates and only keep one that is above in layer list
  2. Works different with selections and frames


Ungroup

  1. Ungroup every group inside selection or frame
plugins.tagline: Pixel art drawing tool with Figma import/export functionality

plugins.name: Duplicates Finder
plugins.description:
Find and select duplicates across various sets of duplicate layers within a selection.


Layers with identical names are regarded as duplicates.


Duplicates Finder simplifies identifying duplicate layers within a selection. It also allows to exclude one from each set of duplicates or select one from each set leaving the rest unselected. It is especially useful when concerning layers are large in number and/or are spread across multiple groups.


How to use

  1. Select the layers you wish to identify duplicates within.
  2. Click "Find Duplicates" to highlight all duplicates, automatically deselecting one instance from each set.
  3. Use "Select Singles" to choose only one layer from each group of duplicates, leaving the rest unselected.


Upcoming

This is an early version of the plugin. In next updates, I will add additional ways to exclude or identify the duplicates. For example, you will be able to identify and exclude layers based on their properties.


For questions, feedback or ideas, please comment below or email me at basepurpose.com@gmail.com
plugins.tagline: Find and select duplicates across various sets of duplicate layers within a selection.

72644.name: Duplicates Finder
72644.description:
Find and select duplicates across various sets of duplicate layers within a selection.


Layers with identical names are regarded as duplicates.


Duplicates Finder simplifies identifying duplicate layers within a selection. It also allows to exclude one from each set of duplicates or select one from each set leaving the rest unselected. It is especially useful when concerning layers are large in number and/or are spread across multiple groups.


How to use

  1. Select the layers you wish to identify duplicates within.
  2. Click "Find Duplicates" to highlight all duplicates, automatically deselecting one instance from each set.
  3. Use "Select Singles" to choose only one layer from each group of duplicates, leaving the rest unselected.


Upcoming

This is an early version of the plugin. In next updates, I will add additional ways to exclude or identify the duplicates. For example, you will be able to identify and exclude layers based on their properties.


For questions, feedback or ideas, please comment below or email me at basepurpose.com@gmail.com
72644.tagline: Find and select duplicates across various sets of duplicate layers within a selection.

plugins.name: FFIT Laum
plugins.description:
Short introduction video: https://youtu.be/5Z3PfCLdEeA


We at FFIT like innovation and technological challenges. Together with our partners and friends, we make technology to empower human beings, allowing them to do more with less effort and leaving no one behind - especially people with disability.


This Figma plugin allows users to access FFIT’s Laum micro-frontend live component gallery and its primitive widget components. The live components are in the form of micro front-ends with high usability and accessibility. We believe that component reuse is the main way to produce high-quality and low-cost software. The discovery of which components should be used/reused must occur at the design time. This helps bridge the gap between end customers (who can actively participate in the process - through participatory design), interaction designers, and requirement engineers. Historically, this approach, widely proclaimed in universities, encounters practical difficulties due to the low interactivity of the components available in the prototyping tools and the low fidelity of the generated prototypes. They even have graphic fidelity but not interactional fidelity. The slightly higher granularity allows more meaningful components to be made available, such as login screens, software terms of use, chats, etc. Because it is based on design system, the rendering of the screens follows the design definitions indicated by the client. Finally, because they are micro front-ends, they are running code, which greatly brings together the actors involved in software production.


Accessibility is another aspect of quality that has gained relevance and deservedly so. All Laum components score top marks for accessibility based on the code check provided by Google Lighthouse. This ensures superior accessibility for people who are blind or visually impaired. For people who are deaf or hard of hearing, some components may contain videos (for sign language). Professional interpreters do all content interpretation. Artificial intelligence or avatars are not used in this process, and this is to ensure that the correct message will reach the person with hearing disability. FFIT customers who need videos with sign language content can order them free of charge via email to: design@ffit.com.br. The videos produced will be inserted into the client's design system and can be reused in prototypes and real applications.


High quality comes from a basic fact: if it is to be reused, it must be done well. In that regard, usability is strengthened through two checks with more than 200 items based on Nielsen's heuristics, one review after the prototyping phase and another after the development phase, before the micro-frontend enters the gallery.


The components from the Laum gallery can be used (reused) at prototyping time through our Figma Plugin. The plugin lets you access the library of Micro-frontends along with its set of primitive widgets. Laum plugin also generates HTML code ready for testing with your users. This code is entirely free. It is yours.


If you are interested in trying it out, contact us at: design@ffit.com.br
plugins.tagline: A plugin built to give the desing the tools to built an even more porwefull live prototype.

plugins.name: Markdown to Figma Layers
plugins.description:
About

Converts Markdown into layers in Figma. Supports tables. Click "Show example" in plugin UI. If sample markdown is generated, yours should work, too.


What's supported

Tables, links, inline styles (only bold and strikethrough), up to 4 Headings, ordered and unordered lists.


What's ahead

Styles customization, checkboxes, maybe images from url, table heading styles could be fixed, support of row-based tables


How to support

Plugin is only published because I like likes. Give a like, share a comment if you're feeling generous, it will make my day 😌


FAQ


Part of my content is not generated. What happened?

It stops generating exactly where it faces markdown that is not handled. It can be a block of code, checkbox, heading level 5+ or something like that. Post a comment and I'll add support unless it's heading level 10 or nested table or something obscure like that.


Can I customize styles?

Not yet, styles are tailored for my project. If you need customization, pls, leave a comment so I'll know it's needed and will do my best to allocate time.
plugins.tagline: Convert Markdown into Figma layers. Tables supported

plugins.name: Liquid Glass Distortion
plugins.description:
Liquid Distortion Plugin Instructions


  1. Add an image background in a Figma Frame, then create or select a rectangle or circle layer (currently only supports rectangles and circles).
  2. Open the plugin to see an initial preview of the effect in the top window.
  3. Adjust parameters below to customize the glass texture.
  4. Click insert to apply the final effect to your layer.


Parameter Details

  1. Clarity

Controls the output quality. Higher values produce sharper details but slower processing. Recommended: 2x.

  1. Distortion Range

Controls the radius of the clear central area. Lower values expand the clear zone.

  1. Distortion Strength

Adjusts edge distortion intensity. Higher values increase stretching.

  1. Gaussian Blur

Adds background blur to simulate frosted glass.

  1. Chromatic Aberration

Adds RGB color separation to edges for optical realism.

Additional Features

  1. iOS Style

Adds iOS system styles without overriding existing layer properties.

  1. Live Insert

Dynamically updates effects during parameter adjustments or layer transformations.

*Note: 200ms delay after operations for performance.*

  1. Parameter Memory

Saves parameters per layer. Re-selecting the layer reloads previous settings.


液态扭曲插件使用说明


  1. 在画框中添加图像背景，创建或选择矩形/圆形图层（当前仅支持此两类）。
  2. 打开插件，顶部预览窗立即显示初始效果。
  3. 通过调节下方的各项参数，定制您想要的玻璃质感。
  4. 点击置入，将最终效果应用到您的图层上。


参数详解

  1. 清晰度

控制输出质量。数值越高细节越锐利，处理速度稍慢。推荐2x。

  1. 扭曲范围

控制中心清晰区域的半径。值越低清晰区域越大。

  1. 扭曲强度

调节边缘扭曲强度。值越高拉伸感越强。

  1. 高斯模糊

添加背景模糊模拟磨砂玻璃质感。

  1. 色散

在边缘添加RGB色彩分离增强光学真实感。


附加功能

  1. iOS 样式

添加iOS系统样式，保留图层原有属性。

  1. 实时置入

调节参数或变换图层时动态更新效果。

注：为保障性能，操作停止后约有200毫秒延迟

  1. 参数记忆功能

按图层保存参数。重新选择时自动加载历史设置。
plugins.tagline: 为椭圆形和矩形制作液态扭曲背景 Create liquid distortion backgrounds for Ellipse and Rectangles

plugins.name: Visual Usability Checker
plugins.description:
AI-powered visual usability insights directly in Figma. Design confidently, iterate faster, launch effectively.


Instant Visual Hierarchy Analysis

Discover what grabs attention first. Our AI predicts where users will look, empowering you to perfect your design before launch.


Effortless Comparison of Design Variations

Rapidly validate multiple layouts side by side. Clearly identify the design version that best guides viewer attention.


Data-Driven Design Decisions

Replace guesswork with actionable data. Confidently optimize your designs using clear, visual insights provided by AI.


Advanced Analytics Made Simple:

  1. Focus Map: Quickly verify essential elements are noticeable within the critical first 3–5 seconds.
  2. Focus Score: Immediately gauge visual clarity—high scores confirm strong visual hierarchy, low scores indicate scattered focus.
  3. Attention Hotspots: Identify elements that most significantly impact visual hierarchy and viewer attention.


Early Access Advantages:

  1. Exclusive early access to new plugin features.
  2. Direct influence over feature development—your feedback shapes the plugin.
  3. Dedicated human support ready to assist.

plugins.name: Icon Resizer
plugins.description:
Icon Resizer saves you time in properly preparing icons for use in your design in the following ways:


  • Quickly add/remove icon dimensions;
  • Ability to generate both individual icons and a grid of variants;
  • Set stroke thickness to frame the size of the icon if it uses outlines;
  • You have a root icon component that allows you to make changes in only one place to edit the entire set;
  • Quickly rename icon components using variables.


Pro features [BUY PRO↗]:

You can set your own price for PRO features. I tried to make this plugin as affordable as possible and really appreciate if you were able to set your price above the minimum price. It helps to recoup the development costs.


  • Preserving the fill color when changing instances of different icons. Now you don't have to re-set the color for an icon every time. This is achieved through proper automatic organization of layers;
  • Analysis of icons for correct structure matching and quick selection;
  • Automatic cleaning of unnecessary nesting within the icon frame.


How to use? SEE GUIDE↗


  1. Select one or more icons you want to generate;
  2. Enter a name for the set to be generated (use variables to pass dimensionality values or the original name, this will apply according to the frame size);
  3. Select the type of generation. As individual components or as a variants set;
  4. Set the desired icon sizes and stroke thickness if needed;
  5. Click the "Generate" button.
plugins.tagline: Quickly create sets of icon components of the required size

plugins.name: TeX to SVG
plugins.description: This plugin renders a TeX expression as an SVG and allows the user to embed it into the their design document. The plugin assumes a dark theme environment and so renders the text as white and scales the text size up by 1.5 times.
plugins.tagline: Renders a math TeX expression as SVG and embeds it into the design document.

58683.name: TeX to SVG
58683.description: This plugin renders a TeX expression as an SVG and allows the user to embed it into the their design document. The plugin assumes a dark theme environment and so renders the text as white and scales the text size up by 1.5 times.
58683.release_notes: Places rendered math in the center of viewport and names the layers with the corresponding TeX string.
58683.tagline: Renders a math TeX expression as SVG and embeds it into the design document.

plugins.name: Jumbo titles
plugins.description:
Create large custom sized titles above the artboards. Artboard name will be automatically copied to generate the titles.


Features

  • One click title generation. No manual work needed!
  • Change all title styles together
  • Select and add titles to specific artboards
  • Remove all titles in single click.
plugins.tagline: Large titles for your artboards!
